Name: Nude Crisis
About the game: Nude Crisis is a Stealth Puzzle game. Hina is an office worker who finds her clothes missing after showering at work. To get home safely, she must circumnavigate bitchy co-workers, salarymen, and the police without being seen, lest they snap photos of her in the buff. She must escape her office building, streak through the park, and sneak back to her apartment if she is to keep her reputation intact. Features Cute Chibi-styled graphics Minimalist art style A short and sweet game filled with puzzles 8 nude photos of our blushing heroine 1 lewd image of the culprit's punishment A gallery of everything unlocked upon completion. Expected completion time: 40 Minutes. testers first clear times: 51 minutes, 56:54.
